With 12 years of service, we left behind with historical contributions to Turkey and democracy with works.
We have identified 3 important dates for ourselves. 2023, 2053 and 2071. It is not possible to successfully lock the non-target.
The AK Party is not a party that has its backs on the status quo.
There is no patience or victory. Victory is sacred for Sabreden.
We are not among those who see it as a violent method. It is the method of those who can not get the support of the people behind arms and violence. We our people are safe.
Examine the closure case against the AK Party in 2007. On those occasions, you will not find any movement other than weapons, violence, democracy.
We were exposed to unlawfulness. We lost our training rights. They cried our girls on the doors of the universities.
We were in trouble. It's dead again. We are not in despair. We have never stepped back from our love struggle.
Now what do they say in Egypt; Crate is not democracy. Who is that? Israel.
We have documents. There are Israel behind the events in Egypt.
The Israeli Foreign Minister and a Jewish scientist say that Muslim Brotherhood in Egypt can not win even the election!
In the presence of Hacı Bektaş, he is attacking the assistant prime minister of this country without knowing himself.
The deputies of the main opposition party are walling around the attacker. They are claiming the attacker.
This does not know himself is questioned, then released to pending trial. Then they go out and talk about the dictatorship.
The newspapers where the dictatorship is, the magazines can not use the dictator's statement in the morning and evening.
We will give the necessary answer in March for those who say dictatorship turkish without being embarrassed and uncomfortable. Now I call them hodri challenge.
The nation will go on election. The last word is the folks. If you want to see a dictator go to Egypt.
